DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect food intake pharmacokinetics YM178 healthy , non-elderly adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Investigate Food Effect Pharmacokinetics YM178 Healthy , Non-elderly Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Healthy judge investigator/subinvestigator base result physical examination lab test Body weight ( screen ) ; female ≥40.0 kg , < 70.0 kg , male ≥50.0 kg , < 80.0 kg BMI ( screen ) : ≥17.6 , < 26.4 Written inform consent obtain Received investigational drug within 120 day screen test Donated 400 mL whole blood within 90 day , 200 mL whole blood within 30 day , blood component within 14 day screen test Received medication within 7 day hospital admission schedule receive medication Females lactating , pregnant , potentially childbearing , willing get pregnant study period History drug allergy Upper gastrointestinal disease ( e.g . nausea , vomit , stomachache ) within 7 day hospital admission
